home.title: Math Quest: Learn Math Through Adventure
home.subtitle: An interactive learning platform that combines the excitement of storytelling with the power of mathematics. Solve problems, defeat monsters, and unlock new chapters in your personalized adventure!

features.title: Everything you need to master math
features.subtitle: Our platform combines engaging storytelling with personalized math problems to make learning fun and effective for students of all levels.

list.name: Interactive Stories
list.description: Immerse yourself in captivating stories where your math skills determine the outcome of the adventure.

list.name: Personalized Learning
list.description: Problems adapt to your skill level, ensuring you're always challenged but never overwhelmed.

list.name: Real-time Feedback
list.description: Get instant feedback on your answers with detailed explanations to help you learn from mistakes.

cta.title: Ready to start your adventure?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of students who are already improving their math skills through engaging stories and interactive problems.
